original_text: So return to your home and have peace in your mind. Do not do anything that will make the other Philistine leaders angry.’ So return to your home and have peace in your mind. Do not do anything that will make the other Philistine leaders angry.’
korean_text: 그러므로 이제 너는 평안히 돌아가서 블레셋 사람들의 수령들에게 거슬러 보이게 하지 말라 하니라

sentences.original_text: and have peace in your mind
that will make the other Philistine leaders angry
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 블레셋 지도자들을 화나게 할 일을
